EmailTemplate.name: BMC_RF_Incident Creation Notification (Client - No Category or Priority: Eng)
EmailTemplate.subject: Incident #(Ref:IN:{!BMCServiceDesk__Incident__c.Name}) has been CREATED {!BMCServiceDesk__Incident__c.BMC_RF_Email_Integration_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!BMCServiceDesk__Incident__c.BMCServiceDesk__clientFirstName__c},
Thank you for contacting IT Support on {!BMCServiceDesk__Incident__c.BMCServiceDesk__openDateTime__c} regarding {!BMCServiceDesk__Incident__c.Summary__c}.
Should you have any questions, please contact IT Support with the reference number {!BMCServiceDesk__Incident__c.Name}.
Thank you, IT Support
NA / LATAM Only: E- chat: @ https://echat.cgi.com/Code/PR (Available weekdays from 8:00AM - 5:00PM Eastern time)
